author: Chris Roche
content: What a fantastic find don`t be so pessimistic there is plenty of other ocean floor to lay a pipeline on.

author: Willy
content: Probably that is when it will happen. The pipeline will get laid when they retrieve the board. Sad state of affairs when profitability replaces the need of knowledge.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: “What’s to stop the Oil/Gas industry (who are motivated solely by profit) from putting the pipeline straight over the top of it?
